general: Today, the Moon in Cancer highlights your emotions and intuition. You may feel an increased need for comfort and security. Interactions with your loved ones will be particularly enriching and will bring you a sense of serenity.
love: Open your heart and express your feelings without fear.
work: Show empathy towards your colleagues to foster a good work environment.
health: Take a moment to recharge, perhaps through meditation or a walk in nature.
advice: Listen to your intuition, it will guide you.
